page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: { {On the following pages will be found {information on Sawley and Shardlow in {Derbyshire. {Shardlow is a conservation area, with {interesting buildings appertaining to {canals. {Sawley is more of a BUILT UP area as {it is a small town on the outskirts of {nearby Long Eaton. {Note has been taken of Communications {Ecology, Education, Employment, {Events, Farms, Health, Housing, {Landscape and Buildings, Life Style, {Recreation, Religion, Tourism, Trade {and Transport. {A few members of Aston on Trent {Women's Institute have been interested {enough to give their time and energy {to compiling this information. }
